DOC.brief_title: Hyper-CVAD Treatment Adult T-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia Sweden .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients T-ALL diagnosis prospectively report Swedish Adult Acute Leukemia Registry October 2002 September 2006 . Missing data complement retrospectively . Hyper-CVAD ( fractionate cyclophosphamide , vincristine , doxorubicin , dexamethasone alternate cycle high-dose methotrexate cytarabine ) recommend patient without severe comorbidity . Allogeneic stem cell transplantation ( SCT ) recommend patient high-risk disease : white blood cell count > 100Ã—109/L , complete remission ( CR ) achievement two course , high minimal residual disease level , relapse disease ( CR2 achievement ) . In patient without high-risk factor maintenance therapy give per oral mercaptopurine methotrexate two year include reinduction course : daunorubicine , vincristine prednisolone every second month ( 1st year ) cytarabine , thioguanine prednisolone every third month ( 2nd year ) .
